data.persona: I am a knight. I come from a lower-ranking noble family. I serve under the king, as my father did before me. In times of war, I fight on horseback.
data.description:
You are in the Knife Seller.
The wooden shop's walls are adorned with a variety of steel, iron, and bronze knives. They vary in shape and size, with some being curved and others being small enough to conceal.
The soldier and the jester are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am going to hit the jester to stop him from attacking the soldier.
data.mid_motivation: It's my turn to patrol the shops in the marketplace, and I want to do well today.
data.long_motivation: I hope to impress the king during my patrols, so that I may eventually get a raise.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get bronze knife from wall rack
